Hello all
I need support for a counter
`put "counter" effect on all numbers in this section. That is, the user when scrolling and when arriving in this section should see the numbers change from +0 to the final number that we have on each card.`

`var a = 0;`
`$(window).scroll(function() {`

  `var oTop = $('#counter').offset().top - window.innerHeight;`
  `if (a == 0 && $(window).scrollTop() > oTop) {`
    `$('.counter-value').each(function() {`
      `var $this = $(this),`
        `countTo = $this.attr('data-count');`
      `$({`
        `countNum: $this.text()`
      `}).animate({`
          `countNum: countTo`
        `},`
        `{`

          `duration: 3000,`
          `easing: 'swing',`
          `step: function() {`
            `$this.text(Math.floor(this.countNum));`
          `},`
          `complete: function() {`
            `$this.text(this.countNum);`
            `//alert('finished');`
          `}`

        `});`
    `});`
    `a = 1;`
  `}`

`});`

`<div class="" data-count="{{ module.yourModule }}">0</div>`

Just add "data-count=" to each of your counter modules.

Got a couple questions on this recently, thought more folks would find the comparison/break down helpful.
